com.facebook.buck.rules

Annotation Type Hint


  • @Retention(value=RUNTIME)
@Target(value={FIELD,METHOD})
public @interface Hint
    Represents hints given when deal with the value returned by Description.createUnpopulatedConstructorArg().

    • Required Element Summary

      Required Elements 
      Modifier and Type Required Element and Description
      String name 

    • Element Detail

      • name

        public abstract String name
        Returns:
        The name to use in preference to the field or property name (eg. "field_name")
